sources.title: She Had to Choose
sources.description: Title: She Had to Choose Summary: A young actress hits Hollywood determined to be a movie star and runs into a lot of roadblocks along the way. Directed by: Ralph Ceder Actors: Buster Crabbe, Isabel Jewell, Sally Blane Production Company: Larry Darmour Productions Release Date: 1 October 1934 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A young actress hits Hollywood determined to be a movie star and runs into a lot of roadblocks along the way.

sources.title: She Had to Choose
sources.description: A young actress (Isabel Jewell) hits Hollywood determined to be a movie star and runs into a lot of roadblocks along the way.

sources.title: She Had to Choose (1934) BUSTER CRABBE
sources.description:
Stars: Buster Crabbe, Isabel Jewell, Sally Blane
 Director: Ralph Ceder

 A young actress hits Hollywood determined to be a movie star and runs into a lot of roadblocks along the way.
